# pkcs11_slots (Data Source)

Lists PKCS#11 slots.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List all available PKCS#11 slots
data "pkcs11_slots" "all" {}

# List only slots with a token present
data "pkcs11_slots" "with_token" {
  token_present = true
}

output "available_slots" {
  value = data.pkcs11_slots.with_token.slots
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `token_present` (Boolean) If true, only return slots with a token present. Default: false.

### Read-Only

- `slots` (Attributes List) List of slots. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--slots))

<a id="nestedatt--slots"></a>
### Nested Schema for `slots`

Read-Only:

- `firmware_version` (String)
- `hardware_version` (String)
- `manufacturer_id` (String)
- `slot_description` (String)
- `slot_id` (Number)
- `token_present` (Boolean)
